title: Android app deals of the day: Fairy Knights, Mortal Crusade, Peppa Pig, more
content:
Our first roundup of the best Android app deals of the week is now live. Just be sure to check out the $100 price drops now live on the new Samsung S21 FE smartphone before you dig in down below. You’ll find deals on titles like Fairy Knights, Mortal Crusade, Peppa Pig: Golden Boots, Peace, Death!, Business Card Scanner Pro, FOTONICA, and more. Hit the jump for a closer look at today’s best Android game and app deals. 

more…
